title: Engineering 2D nickel boride/borate amorphous/amorphous heterostructures for electrocatalytic water splitting and magnetisms
content:

The rational engineering of 2D amorphous/amorphous heterostructures is considered a promising route to finely tune the intrinsic properties of 2D nanomaterials. Herein, we demonstrate a simple strategy to engineer 2D...
